"About Saving / Loading mission progress:
"When quest progress is saved,
if the quest is abandoned,
it can be resumed from the saved point。"

"About Saving Quest Progress

When quest progress is saved
The message, \"Quest progress has been saved\", will be displayed。
After that, you will be able to resume the quest from that point。"

"About Loading the Quest

After saving the quest, entering the Campship's Telepipe
will open a window allowing you to resume from the save point。"

"If you select the option to continue,
you will resume the quest from the save point onward。
※The outcome of the mission will not be affected。"
